attributes.title: horrible and repulsive 🤮🤢🤮

attributes.title: I mean..

attributes.title: instructions unclear
attributes.review: i opened the app and the first thing i saw was an orange shrimp! i got scared and read the first words i could ‘help us make america great’ i got very confused. so i did what any normal unicorn would do and microwaved my cat. she looks like albert einstein now! please take down this app as a rip to my albert einsten cat who does all my math homework now. dub dub 🙈🙄😼😋😋😋🔌💅🔁🔁🔁🥳🧇🙈
